Items.Name: Mat
Items.LookDescription: A rubber mat saying 'Check the readme file for a list of new commands!' lies here.
Items.InventoryDescription: A welcome mat. It reminds you to check the readme file to see a list of new commands.

Items.Name: Mailbox
Items.LookDescription: There is a small mailbox here.

Items.Name: Leaves
Items.LookDescription: There is a pile of leaves here.

Items.Name: Flyer
Items.LookDescription: There is a flyer here. It reads: 'Domino's Pizza grand opening! Located east of the clearing.'
Items.InventoryDescription: A flyer that reads: 'Domino's Pizza grand opening! Located east of the clearing.'

Rooms.Name: Domino's Pizza
Rooms.Description: You have entered an eatery from the future. A dwarf stands behind the counter (presumably on a stool) ready to take your order.

Rooms.Name: West of House
Rooms.Description: This is an open field west of a white house, with a boarded front door.

Rooms.Name: North of House
Rooms.Description: You are facing the north side of a white house. There is no door here, and all the windows are barred.

Rooms.Name: South of House
Rooms.Description: You are facing the south side of a white house. There is no door here, and all the windows are barred.

Rooms.Name: Behind House
Rooms.Description: You are behind the white house. In one corner of the house there is a small window which is slightly ajar.

Rooms.Name: Forest 1
Rooms.Description: This is a forest, with trees in all directions around you.

Rooms.Name: Forest 2
Rooms.Description: This is a dimly lit forest, with large trees all around. One particularly large tree with some low branches stands here.

Rooms.Name: Forest 3
Rooms.Description: This is a dimly lit forest, with large trees all around. To the east, there appears to be sunlight.

Rooms.Name: Clearing
Rooms.Description: You are in a clearing, with a forest surrounding you on the west and south. A 'Domino's Pizza' restaurant stands to the east.
